pageContext.claim: “As you know, we're doing record and close-to-record GDP.  Nobody thought we'd be anywhere above, even close to 2.  And we're at 4.1, and I think we're going much higher.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump touts quarterly GDP growth of 4 percent, suggesting the figure was unheard of being he took office. Most recently, GDP growth hit 5.2 percent in the third quarter of 2014 while Obama was still in office.
